about.title: üìã About me
about.userDescription: Hello, my name is Erick Nathan, I am a dedicated front-end developer, with extensive experience in technologies such as NodeJS and ReactJS, and a track record with notable clients such as Uber Chip, Correios Celular and Carrefour at Pagtel, specializing in robust and user-friendly solutions to the user, prioritizing scalability, accessibility and optimized performance.

projects.title: My projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I have worked on, you can find more on my <github>Github</github>

guestbook.title: Guestbook
guestbook.description: Welcome to my guestbook! Why not leave your message here? Either it's a quick hello, a warm message, or a joke, surprise me üòÅ

messages.empty: There are no messages yet, be the first to leave one!
messages.error: üö® An error occurred while loading messages, please try again later.
messages.cooldown: üïí You must wait {minutes} minutes and {seconds} seconds to send another message.

buttons.signIn: Sign in to leave a message

deleteDialog.title: üßπ Delete message
deleteDialog.content: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

toast.error: üö® An error occurred while deleting the message, please try again later.

uses.title: Stack and uses
uses.description: Explore the technologies and tools that power my development journey. I carefully choose and leverage these tools to create robust, efficient, and user-centric solutions.

404.alt: Mario Bros, a character with his blue overalls, red cap, and trademark moustache, dancing.

503.alt: Steve, a human character with a blocky appearance, which is consistent with the aesthetic and art style of Minecraft, wears a light blue shirt with blue jeans, and has light blue eyes, and dark brown hair, building a house.

userData.name: Erick Nathan
userData.interests: Listen Music, Travel, Play Games and Watch Live Coding
userData.avatarAltDescription: A boy with curly hair smiling, wearing business clothes with a {colorScheme} bow tie.

easy-aluga.shortDescription: A white-label application to rent any vehicle, developed during the BRQ Easy Carros Challenge on FIAP.

stone-currency.shortDescription: Web application developed to facilitate the conversion of monetary values from US dollars to Brazilian reals.

3d-product-preview.shortDescription: A simple 3D sofa product previewer made with Svelte and Threlte, a ThreeJS library for Svelte.

podcastr.shortDescription: A user-friendly web application designed for playing and managing audio episodes of your favorite podcast effortlessly.

devify.shortDescription: Web application to displays the song currently playing on my spotify account.

codeleap-network.shortDescription: CodeLeap Network is a social network application developed to manage posts on an API provided by CodeLeap.

igtimer.shortDescription: A project that allows the user to time their daily tasks, in addition to allowing them to see a history of all the tasks already carried out.

four-dev.shortDescription: A social network application for registering questionnaires, including functionalities for synthesizing knowledge in React with Typescript and Hooks, using TDD, Clean Architecture, Design Patterns and SOLID.

foodie.shortDescription: A landing page developed with HTML and CSS during the Marking Language classes at Senai.

tic-tac-toe.shortDescription: A simple tic tac toe game developed with HTML, CSS and Javascript during the Web Front-End Programming classes at Senai.

happy.shortDescription: Application that connects the community to shelters, allowing the addition of shelters, expansion of visitors and essential information, such as schedules, target audience, location and visiting instructions.

e-survey.shortDescription: A modular API with a solid architecture and Test-Driven Development (TDD), following the principles of SOLID and Clean Architecture, implementing Design Patterns for scalability and efficiency.

rentx.shortDescription: Efficient and reliable car rental API, using Express, Typescript, TypeORM, and Swagger, with a modular architecture and clear documentation.

nest-rabbitmq.shortDescription: Robust and scalable microservices architecture, using NestJS for easier maintenance, with RabbitMQ integration for effective asynchronous communication and intelligent task distribution.

metadata.description: Front-end developer passionate about creating incredible digital experiences. Explore my portfolio and discover how my programming skills can boost your project. Discover my work and get in touch for collaborations or professional opportunities.

companyThanks.message:
Hello {companyName} recruiter,



Thank you for visiting my portfolio! üòÄ I'm excited to share more about my journey and experiences. Feel free to explore my work, and if you have any questions or interests, I'm happy to talk.



Sincerely, Erick
